entry.title: New release for Richy: 1.0.0
entry.content:
• Dashboard updated - more headings, portfolio divided into cards
  • Fixed closed transactions list - item detail link
  • Fixed not opening new transaction dialog automatically
  • Updated fetching of current price (+ new closed status)
  • Better item detail price representation + added value change
  • New possibility to set Redis URL + database number #122
  • Updated ETF basic info fetching + presentation
  • New possibility to set database port #122
  • Minor fixes
  • Item detail - value and percentage charts moved under tabs #124
  • Fixed documentation structure + new theme
  • Fixed assets charts in terms of not mixing different currenc

entry.title: New release for Richy: 1.1.0
entry.content:
• Added: basic drawdown and ATHs statistic + chart #123
  • Updated: Node.js 15 -> 22
  • Added: typos check
  • Added: year low/high meter (item detail page)
  • Fixed: dividend transactions recalculation for transaction tree with branches
  • Added: transaction graph for shares and ETFs #30
  • Added: parent transaction info to transaction detail page
  • Updated: performance table - record order reversed.
  • Updated: The Eye - each item type has it's own implementation now (and menu item).
  • Added: historical data (3 month) view page added for items
  • Fixed: cache refreshing (ATH, drawdowns)
  • Updated: ditch "docker" prefix for compose files.
  • Updated: dependencies + python to 3.13
  • Removed: trends
  • Fixed: sign-out process.
  • Fixed: ETF holdings fetching
  • Updated: massive performance boost across the whole app
  • Added: closing transaction shortcut
  • Updated: price upserts - now in bulks
  • Added: item discontinued flag (in admin only)
